name: LUSTCASE
description:
Immerse yourself in a complex and sexy world of intrigue in Lust Case. 

Hunt down the killer, solve all the puzzles, as you progress through the game, the tension and passion will only grow. Throw caution to the wind and show the city who is the greatest detective! Riddles are revealed by clicking on the clues left at the crime scene. Clues come in the form of sexual agents eager to help you. Collect enough evidence and the mystery will be solved.

Play as a detective in a dark city who needs to use every ounce of his skill to solve various crimes. As investigations progress, the sex agents in the detective's squad will point out helpful tips and ask that certain clues be found. Work quickly because time may run out before every nook and cranny has been surveyed and all key objects found. Various suspects will be identified and new evidence highlighted. As the crime is solved, the agents will trust the detective more. When they level up, their illustrated cards are stripped. Strip this hottie naked and she will truly do wonders when it comes to solving crimes! Get it done and move on to the next case!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Investigate sex crimes in this filthy world
  • Mystery, tension and excitement grow with every click
  • Vivid and engaging art work
